original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
overview: Meet Fluttershy, a graceful, fawn-like maiden with gentle, serene ways, a natural beauty. Despite her shy and unassuming nature, Fluttershy has a unique gift with animals. Though she's afraid of heights (very embarrassing for a Pegasus) and jumps sometimes at the slightest sound, Fluttershy has no problem confronting grumpy Manticores or scolding greedy Dragons!
title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
